/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. On the left side of the street, there's a large body of water, adding a serene element to the bustling cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
